item.title: Disable Suspend on Linux
item.description: Disable / Mask services using systemctl sudo systemctl mask sleep.target suspend.target hibernate.target hybrid-sleep.target Edit “/etc/systemd/logind.conf” to avoid errors and high CPU usage HandleSuspendKey=ignore HandleHibernateKey=ignore HandleLidSwitch=ignore HandleLidSwitchExternalPower=ignore HandleLidSwitchDocked=ignore Restart systemd-logind sudo systemctl restart systemd-logind Check for errors journalctl -xe That’s it!
